data.title: Henning Mankell - Biography, Books, & Facts - Britannica
data.meta_description: Henning Mankell _ Biography, Books, & Facts _ Britannica - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Henning Mankell was a Swedish author best known for his crime novels featuring police inspector Kurt Wallander. Mankell wrote the Wallander novels between 1991 and 2009, as well as other crime novels featuring different characters. Throughout his career, Mankell divided his time between homes in Sweden and Mozambique, where he worked to bring attention to AIDS issues in Africa.
